featured.text: Black tea preparation consists mainly of picking young leaves and leaf buds on a clear sunny day and letting the leaves dry for about an hour in the sun.
They are protected by a space suit from the radiation of the Sun.
There’s nothing new under the sun.
Watching the sun ______ from a sea of clouds is a must-do activity for all visitors to Ali Mountain.

other.text: The construction of the Going-to-the-Sun Road was a huge task.
How has the Going-to-the-Sun Road influenced the way people experience the Glacier National Park? (A) The scenery along the road is too beautiful for visitors to drive carefully.
It keeps the rain and the sun off people.
Eventually, the demand for a road across the mountains led to the building of the Going-to-the-Sun Road.
Kim was completely ______ after jogging in the hot sun all afternoon; she had little energy left.
The story about Hou-I shooting down nine suns is a well-known Chinese _____, but it may not be a true historical event.
Obviously, a physically 22 person with an outdoor job under the sun will need to drink more fluid than a desk-bound person who lives and works in an air-conditioned place.
Looking at the sun _____ could damage our eyes.
Mike fainted under the hot sun in his rice field.

definition.zh_def: 太陽：發光的恆星，位於太陽系的中心，為地球提供光和熱。
definition.en_def: The sun: A luminous star at the center of the solar system that provides light and heat to the Earth.
definition.example: The sun rises in the east and sets in the west.
